title: Update UpcomingFragment.java
message: Update UpcomingFragment.java

title: Add extra filters
message:
Add extra filters

New filters are ANIMAL_WELFARE, ARTS_HERITAGE, DISABILITY, ENVIRONMENT,
FAMILY, PUBLIC_SERVICE and SPORTS.
The filters in the nav bar now reflect these changes as well.

title: Add info panels to upcoming page, implement back button, removed some placeholders
message:
Add info panels to upcoming page, implement back button, removed some placeholders

Upcoming page: tapping on an event now pulls up the same sliding panel
as the map entry
Back button: if on page other than map, brings you back to map; if
sliding panel is open on map, closes panel
Placeholders: the overflow menu on the titlebar

title: Merge pull request #1 from kaine119/app_store
message:
Merge pull request #1 from kaine119/app_store

Merge app_store

title: Add upcoming screen
message:
Add upcoming screen

The upcoming screen now exists; it's just a placeholder screen
currently, does not have proper user-basis features. :smile_cat:

title: Add filtering of events on map
message:
Add filtering of events on map

EventInfo now has a new enum called Tag, which denotes what categories
the event is in.
The menu on the side now has actual filters.

title: Allow title to change depending on the screen
message:
Allow title to change depending on the screen

The title now changes to "Voluntunity" on the map screen, "Profile" on
the profile screen, and "Leaderboard" on the leaderboard screen.

title: Improve leaderboard screen with proper sorting
message:
Improve leaderboard screen with proper sorting

Implements sorting scores on the leaderboard, as well as colouring the
top three scores gold, silver and bronze.
Also removes the score label on the side bar.

title: Add ability to pull events from firebase
message:
Add ability to pull events from firebase

Now the app pulls event information from a database, so no more
hardcoding events.
A new class has been introduced: EventInfo describes an event's info.

title: Fix bug where activities edit null views
message:
Fix bug where activities edit null views

Before this, a view might try to edit a view after it's been deleted by
going away from the view. Now it doesn't.

I've also fixed the orientation for the app to portrait. That helps too.

title: Add filtering of friends on leaderboard, and some bug fixes
message:
Add filtering of friends on leaderboard, and some bug fixes

Now users only see their facebook friends on the leaderboard.
This was a rush job the night before the deadline, so it is *really*
hacky.
I'll get around refactoring it ... at some point. =\

title: Add ability to push to firebase when new user logs in
message:
Add ability to push to firebase when new user logs in

Now, when a new user logs in, their user id, skillsets (currently
placeholders), and reputation and scores (currently 0) is pushed to the
firebase.

title: Add support to filter list of users from db by an array of userIds
message:
Add support to filter list of users from db by an array of userIds

This new change grabs a list of users' friends, and filters the raw list
of users from the db according to the user's friends. This effectively
results in only the user's friends being shown.
Unfortunately, since I have no friends (who use this app), I'm putting
in a sample array at the moment.

title: Remove unnecessary enumerable from HOME_SCREEN_STATE
message:
Remove unnecessary enumerable from HOME_SCREEN_STATE

@PohSayKeong forgot to remove UPCOMING from HOME_SCREEN_STATE

title: Add Firebase support for leaderboard
message:
Add Firebase support for leaderboard

I created a firebase, and populated it with random data. The leaderboard
page pulls from there.
Signing in doesn't actually add you to the database of users, but that
can easily be implemented.
This modifies gradle settings very significantly, so if gradle sync
doesn't work, clean the project under "Build -> Clean Project"

title: Add profile picture to profile page, side menu
message:
Add profile picture to profile page, side menu

It's just two image views. The image url is stored in sharedPreferences,
along with the profile name and email.
Sidenote, I've had to enable multidex support; dependencies became too big

title: Migrate leaderbard view to a proper adapter
message:

title: Add hours field to profile page
message:
Add hours field to profile page

The field labeled "Hours" will have a value shown underneath it when logged in.
It's very much a placeholder value at the moment (36)

title: Add borders in upcoming page
message:
Add borders in upcoming page

Just a border around the only item there to make it look like a list of tiles.
